key.name: jenkins-url
key.summary: Jenkins CI Server web frontend URL
key.description: This is the URL of the web frontend provided by your Jenkins CI Server.

key.name: autorefresh
key.description: If enabled, the Jenkins CI Server will be checked at the given interval. If disabled, the Jenkins CI Server will only be checked when opening the popup menu.

key.name: autorefresh-interval
key.description: This is the interval in seconds in which the extensions checks the Jenkins CI Server for the jobs state.

key.name: notification-finished-jobs
key.description: If enabled, you will be notified in the message tray once a job has finished.

key.name: stack-notifications
key.description: If enabled, notifications will be stacked in the message tray until you read them. Disable to use transient notifications.

key.name: show-running-jobs
key.description: If enabled, currently running jobs will appear in the popup menu. Disable to hide running jobs.

key.name: show-successful-jobs
key.description: If enabled, jobs with the last build being successful will appear in the popup menu. Disable to hide successful jobs.

key.name: show-unstable-jobs
key.description: If enabled, jobs with the last build being successful but instable will appear in the popup menu. Disable to hide unstable jobs.

key.name: show-failed-jobs
key.description: If enabled, jobs with the last build not being successful will appear in the popup menu. Disable to hide failed jobs.

key.name: show-neverbuilt-jobs
key.description: If enabled, never built jobs will appear in the popup menu. Disable to hide never built jobs.

key.name: show-disabled-jobs
key.description: If enabled, disabled jobs will appear in the popup menu. Disable to hide disabled jobs.

key.name: show-aborted-jobs
key.description: If enabled, aborted jobs will appear in the popup menu. Disable to hide aborted jobs.
